to regionBased on the WHO definition, self-care in traditional medicine generally includes 
the following approaches and activities:
✱  Health promotion and prevention of illness.
✱  Healthy lifestyle - diet, physical activity, healthy daily schedule, good conduct and good thoughts.
✱  Procedures, techniques and exercises to promote health such as acupressure, massage (Chinese  Tuina, Nuad Thai , Indian  Abhyanga of Ayurveda), and 
exercises (Qigong, Tai-Chi ).
